change.item: Collection level finding aid created by Sheri Sarnoff

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.unittitle: Chapin, Day, and Ely Lumber Mill Records

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Chapin, Day, and Ely Lumber Mill -- Springfield (Mass.)

did.abstract: The financial and business records of a late 18th century Springfield, Massachusetts lumber mill.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The lumber mill was owned by Phineas Chapin, Joel Day, and John Ely in Springfield, Massachusetts.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes financial account books from 1774-1789 and a work register from 1775-1789 for the lumber mill of Phineas Chapin, Joel Day, and John Ely in Springfield, Massachusetts.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Chapin, Day, and Ely Lumber Mill Records, 1774-1789. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Chapin, Day, and Ely Lumber Mill Records).

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The provenance of this collection is unknown.
